content:
Hi @Chris Hughes, I want to delete docs#fin.cast_add_right for two reasons:

  • it is a duplicate of docs#fin.nat_add;
  • as for me, the name suggests that it's another form of docs#fin.cast_add which does not modify the value.
That's a good enough reason to delete it. I think so long as fin.nat_add is mentioned in the docstring for cast_add since it is the other sensible map fin n -> fin (m + n) then I've no objection.
BTW, what's the difference between @[elab_as_eliminator] and @[elab_as_eliminator, elab_strategy]? (fixing fin.add_cases)
